ManageTurnPlayerNotFirstPlayer() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.TurnHandlerTest
ManageTurnPlayerNotFirstPlayer verify that ManageTurn added a point to the first player who fills the library and if the player isn't the FirstPlayer or the last one, passes the turn to the next player.
